subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Steven Register, who led the minor leagues in saves last season, joined the Mets by way of the Rule 5 draft, meaning he must make the 25-man roster or be offered back to the Rockies.
snippet: Steven Register, who led the minor leagues in saves last season, joined the Mets by way of the Rule 5 draft, meaning he must make the 25-man roster or be offered back to the Rockies.
